title: [build cop] OSX failure in runtime libraries loading

content.raw:
The job [gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/gazebo-install-one_liner-homebrew-amd64) failed with an error that seems to reference a couple dependencies in gazebo.

```
==> Pouring gazebo8-8.0.0_6.yosemite.bottle.tar.gz
🍺  /usr/local/Cellar/gazebo8/8.0.0_6: 1,184 files, 121.5MB
+ brew audit gazebo8
Error: 3 problems in 1 formula
osrf/simulation/gazebo8:
  * Dependency bullet does not define option "with-shared"
  * Dependency bullet does not define option "with-shared"
  * The installation was broken.
    Broken dylib links found:
      /usr/local/opt/protobuf/lib/libprotobuf.12.dylib
+ true
+ brew test gazebo8
Testing osrf/simulation/gazebo8
==> Using the sandbox
==> /usr/local/Cellar/gazebo8/8.0.0_6/bin/gz sdf
Last 15 lines from /Users/jenkins/Library/Logs/Homebrew/gazebo8/test.01.gz:
2017-05-01 04:14:52 -0700

/usr/local/Cellar/gazebo8/8.0.0_6/bin/gz
sdf

dyld: Library not loaded: /usr/local/opt/protobuf/lib/libprotobuf.12.dylib
  Referenced from: /usr/local/Cellar/gazebo8/8.0.0_6/bin/gz
  Reason: image not found
Error: osrf/simulation/gazebo8: failed
Failed executing: /usr/local/Cellar/gazebo8/8.0.0_6/bin/gz sdf
```
